name: Five Nights At Freddy's: Corrupted Memory
name_original: Five Nights At Freddy's: Corrupted Memory
description: A while ago Fisher airport decided they would save on cost by replacing some staff with animatronics. They got these animatronics with recycled parts from some old pizza place. One day an animatronic malfunction and the airport got evacuated. After the evacuation was complete they accidentally left a 10 year old girl named Sakura behind.
